name: Teleskopiq
description: Create and manage AI-generated YouTube scripts, metadata, thumbnails, and publishing schedules via the Teleskopiq GraphQL API. Supports full production markup (B-Roll, Visuals, Graphics, Music, SFX tags), server-side auto-scheduling, channel style profiles, and AI-powered script writing via WebSocket streaming.
author: nethunter

TELESKOPIQ_API_KEY.description: Your Teleskopiq API key (format: tsk_...). Generate one in Teleskopiq Settings â†’ API Keys.

TELESKOPIQ_ENDPOINT.description: Teleskopiq GraphQL endpoint URL. Defaults to the hosted service.
